title: Boxplots to summarize and compare data sets

content.question: The boxplots above summarize two data sets, A and B. Which of the following must be true? Set A contains more data than Set B. The box of Set A contains more data than the box of Set B. The data in Set A have a larger range than the data in Set B.

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Compare distributions or relative positions of points within a distribution.
